name: Art Itself Vomits
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

♡＼(￣▽￣)／♡

Welcome to Art Itself Vomits, a perpetual art exhibition. 

This installation consists of a virtual environment that can be explored at will. A secret dungeon in the Web, perpetually displaying Enjoyable Music's idea of Sonic Beauty. The focal point is a 3D statue that can be admired while walking freely through the exhibition. As exclusive soundtrack to the virtual room, there is the mutated ambient music Mock Muzak~Relaxing Interior Loop~~ performed by Enjoyable Music.  

Find the Great Hidden Mechanism. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This installation is part of the album A Liturgy Of Wires by the post-cybergrind band Enjoyable Music. It has been released by the label Musica Orizzontale from Italy. Support the label at

https://musicaorizzontale.bandcamp.com/album/mo16-a-liturgy-of-wires

Support the band at 

https://enjoyablemusic.bandcamp.com/
